dataList.name: AoE Attack
dataList.desc: Targets 2 or more foes.

dataList.name: Attack Power Up
dataList.desc: Attack skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Haste
dataList.desc: Speed increases by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Defense Power Up
dataList.desc: Defense skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Attack Power Down
dataList.desc: Attack skills lose final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Bind
dataList.desc: Speed decreases by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Fragile
dataList.desc: Take more damage from skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

dataList.name: Shock
dataList.desc: Take more damage by the effect’s Count.

dataList.name: Burn
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, take fixed damage by the effect’s Count, then halve it.

dataList.name: Bleed
dataList.desc: When attacking, take fixed damage equal to (Count)% of current HP, then halve it.

dataList.name: Marked
dataList.desc: Targeted by the character with the Passive [Sharp Edge].

dataList.name: Compulsion (Low Morale)
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, gain 2 Haste and 2 Fragile.

dataList.name: Compulsion (Panic)
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, lose 10 HP.

dataList.name: Outlash (Low Morale)
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, gain 2 Attack Power Up and 2 Fragile.

dataList.name: Outlash (Panic)
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, a random ally loses 20 SP.

dataList.name: Charge
dataList.desc: Resource used by certain skills for additional effects. Its Count can go up to 20. Count lowers by 1 at the end of each turn.

dataList.name: Ongoing Damage
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, take fixed damage by the effect’s Count.

dataList.name: Attack Power Up
dataList.desc: Attack skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Protection
dataList.desc: Take less damage from skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

dataList.name: Damage Up
dataList.desc: Deal more damage with skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

dataList.name: Defense Level Up
dataList.desc: Defense Level increases based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

dataList.name: Plus Coin Boost
dataList.desc: Raise the Power of Plus Coins by the effect’s Count.

dataList.name: Minus Coin Boost
dataList.desc: Raise the Power of Minus Coins by the effect’s Count.

dataList.name: Multiply Coin Boost
dataList.desc: Raise the Power of Multiply Coins by the effect’s Count.

dataList.name: Defense Power Down
dataList.desc: Defense skills lose final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Power Down
dataList.desc: All skills lose final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Damage Down
dataList.desc: Deal less damage with skills based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

dataList.name: Defense Level Down
dataList.desc: Defense Level decreases based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

dataList.name: Paralyze
dataList.desc: Fix the Power of Coins to 0 for one turn, with one Coin per the effect’s Count.

dataList.name: Plus Coin Drop
dataList.desc: Reduce the power of Plus Coins by the effect’s Count.

dataList.name: Minus Coin Drop
dataList.desc: Reduce the power of Minus Coins by the effect’s Count.

dataList.name: Multiply Coin Drop
dataList.desc: Reduce the power of Multiply Coins by the effect’s Count.

dataList.name: Moonlight
dataList.desc: Resource used by certain skills for additional effects.

dataList.name: Rage
dataList.desc: Spent by certain skills. Required for the use of certain skills.

dataList.name: Immobilize
dataList.desc: Does not act for the turn.

dataList.name: Burn
dataList.desc:
At the end of the turn, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency.
Then, reduce its Count by 1.

dataList.name: Bleed
dataList.desc:
When tossing an attack Coin, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency.
Then, reduce its Count by 1.

dataList.name: Tremor
dataList.desc:
When attacked by skills that burst Tremor, raise the Stagger Threshold by the effect’s Potency.
At the end of the turn, reduce the Count by 1.

dataList.name: Rupture
dataList.desc:
When hit by an attack, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency.
Then, reduce its Count by 1.

dataList.name: Sinking
dataList.desc:
When hit by an attack, take fixed SP damage by the effect’s Potency.
(Units with no Sanity take Gloom damage instead.)
Then, reduce its Count by 1.

dataList.name: Poise
dataList.desc:
On hit, gain a Potency-based chance to deal critical damage, reducing the Count by 1 if successful.
At the end of the turn, reduce the Count by 1.

dataList.name: Blood Sac
dataList.desc: Use a powerful attack after the Count reaches a certain amount.

dataList.name: Fluid Sac
dataList.desc: Heals HP based on the Count.

dataList.name: Lightning
dataList.desc: Powers up after the Count reaches a certain amount.

dataList.name: Oppression
dataList.desc: Cannot act for one turn. When hit, flees battle after the attacker’s skill has finished.

dataList.name: Surgery
dataList.desc:
Die when Count reaches 5.
Reduce Max HP by 20% (per Count).
Deal 20% (per Count) more damage.
At the start of the turn, gain Haste by the effect’s Count.

dataList.name: Makeshift Surgery
dataList.desc:
Boost Max HP by 25% and skill Power by 1 per this effect’s Count.
Each turn, increase this effect’s Count by 1.
Die when Count reaches 5.

dataList.name: Pink Ribbons
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, if at 5+ Potency, remove this effect and apply ‘Desirous’ next turn.

dataList.name: Desirous
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, gain 10 Bind.
All phys. resistances change to ‘Fatal’.
Attack Skill Power +2.
Defense Skill Power -2.

dataList.name: Pink Ribbons
dataList.desc:
Count increases by 1 whenever the affected unit tosses an attack skill Coin.
At the end of the turn, inflict Bind by the effect’s Count, then remove the effect.

dataList.name: Maggots
dataList.desc: Turn End: Take Gluttony damage by the Count, then lower it by 1; Bleed Count +1.

dataList.name: Offense Level Up
dataList.desc: Offense Level increases based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

dataList.name: Offense Level Down
dataList.desc: Offense Level decreases based on the effect’s Count for one turn. (Max 10)

dataList.name: Great Mountain
dataList.desc: When attacked, inflict +1 Burn Count on the attacker.

At the end of the turn, gain one of the following, then reduce this effect’s Count by 1.
1 Attack Power Down/1 Defense Power Down/1 Offense Level Down/1 Defense Level Down.

Boost the damage of attacks against Weak resistances by a % based on Count.

Spent by certain skills.

dataList.name: Nails
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, gain 1 Bleed and increase the Bleed Count by this effect’s Count.
At the end of the turn, halve the Count. (Rounded down)

dataList.name: Fanatic
dataList.desc: Raise Skill Final Power by the effect’s Count against units with Nails for the turn.

dataList.name: Gaze
dataList.desc:
Take +20% damage from Pierce and Blunt skills for one turn.
The ally that defeats the marked unit heals 10 SP; if the ally is from N Corp, also apply 1 Fanatic next turn.

dataList.name: Blunt Power Up
dataList.desc: Blunt skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Weakness Analyzed
dataList.desc: A random “Endure” or “Normal” attack type resistance is weakened [+0.2 to damage multiplier] for one turn.

dataList.name: Karma
dataList.desc: Take +1% damage per Count. At the end of the turn, if at 108+ Count, the unit dies.

dataList.name: Captivity
dataList.desc:
Become Staggered for 3 turns.
Turn Start: If Kqe-1j-23 is Staggered, remove this status.

dataList.name: Envy Power Up
dataList.desc: Envy skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Cyclical Karma
dataList.desc:
All units transfer their Karma to their targets after a successful attack.
Karma is not transferred to My Form Empties as long as its allies are alive.

dataList.name: Ecstatic
dataList.desc: All the Maw’s physical resistances change to ‘Fatal’.

dataList.name: Purity
dataList.desc: All parts gain 3 Bind and 3 Damage Up, and their phys. resistances change to ‘Fatal’.

dataList.name: HP Healing Down
dataList.desc: Decreases HP healing provided by Passive abilities, Skills, and Coin effects. (Max 5)

dataList.name: Offense level+
dataList.desc: Offense Level increases by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Appetite
dataList.desc:
Increases the healing provided by the Passive [Rustle Up].
Spent when the Passive activates.

dataList.name: E.G.O Resource Amp
dataList.desc: Increases the amount of E.G.O resources earned from skills by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Frenzy
dataList.desc: Gain 3 Attack Power Up and 3 Fragile for one turn, and change behavior. Does not gain Aggression when attacked.

dataList.name: Dimensional Rift
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, gain Rupture Count by this effect’s amount. Then, remove this effect.

dataList.name: Umbrella Splinters
dataList.desc: Gain 5 Rupture per Count at turn end
dataList.summary: Gain 5 Rupture per Count at turn end

dataList.name: Entangled Curse Talisman
dataList.desc:
Deal +1% damage per Count
At 9+ Count, gain 2 Attack Power Down at turn start
dataList.summary: Deal +1% damage per Count; at 9+ Count, gain 2 Attack Power Down at turn start

dataList.name: Reattached Curse Talisman
dataList.desc:
At 9+ Count, gain 5 Bind at turn end.
At 12+ Count, gain 5 Attack Power Down at turn end.
dataList.summary:
At 9+ Count, gain 5 Bind at turn end.
At 12+ Count, gain 5 Attack Power Down at turn end.

dataList.name: Capacitor
dataList.desc: It seems to be storing electricity in its body.

dataList.name: Self-charge
dataList.desc: Electric currents seem to flow around its body.

dataList.name: Morale Boost
dataList.desc:
Gain Damage Up by the the effect's Count every turn (Max 5)
Cannot gain the status while Tipsy
dataList.summary: Gain Damage Up by the effect's Count every turn; Cannot gain the status while Tipsy

dataList.name: Tipsy
dataList.desc: Lose Clash Power by the effect's Count (Max 5)
dataList.summary: Lose Clash Power by the effect's Count

dataList.name: Predation
dataList.desc: It seems to be preparing a powerful move.

dataList.name: Burn Resistance
dataList.desc: When taking damage from Burn, reduce the damage by 10% per Count (Max 10)
dataList.summary: When taking damage from Burn, take 10% less damage per Count

dataList.name: Resonant
dataList.desc: When bursting Tremor or raising stagger threshold, deal 3 fixed damage per Count and further raise stagger threshold by 3% per Count
dataList.summary: Tremor bursts and stagger threshold raisers deal damage and raise more stagger threshold

dataList.name: Tremor Sync
dataList.desc: In a clash, the opponent has -1 Clash Power for every 5 Tremor they have
dataList.summary: In a clash, the opponent has -1 Clash Power for every 5 Tremor they have

dataList.name: Decay Ampule
dataList.desc: Take damage by 2% of Max HP per Count
dataList.summary: Take damage by 2% of Max HP per Count

dataList.name: Interlocking Time
dataList.desc: Reduce final damage by 30% and store it. At 3 Count, take fixed damage by 1.5 times the accumulated damage, and gain 3 Bind next turn.
dataList.summary: Reduce final damage by 30% and store it. At 3 Count, take fixed damage by 1.5 times the accumulated damage, and gain 3 Bind next turn.

dataList.name: Borrowed Time
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, gain 3 Haste and 2 Damage Up; If only 1 Count remains, gain 4 Bind and 1 Attack Power Down next turn
dataList.summary: At the end of the turn, gain 3 Haste and 2 Damage Up; If only 1 Count remains, gain 4 Bind and 1 Attack Power Down next turn

dataList.name: Bleed Resistance
dataList.desc: When taking damage from Bleed, reduce the damage by 10% per Count (Max 10)
dataList.summary: When taking damage from Bleed, take 10% less damage per Count

dataList.name: Unresolved Sorrow
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, gain Attack Power Down by the Count.
At the end of the turn, if this effect is at 3+ Count, changes to Expanding Sorrow

dataList.name: Wavering Emotions
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Randomly gain Attack Power Down, Paralyze, or Bind by this effect's Count, then remove this effect
dataList.summary: Turn Start: Randomly gain Attack Power Down, Paralyze, or Bind by this effect's Count, then remove this effect

dataList.name: Fear
dataList.desc: Turn End: At -20 SP or lower, gain 1 Protection next turn.
dataList.summary: Turn End: At -20 SP or lower, gain 1 Protection next turn.

dataList.name: Stressed
dataList.desc: Turn End: At -25 SP or lower, gain 1 Defense Power Up next turn
dataList.summary: Turn End: At -25 SP or lower, gain 1 Defense Power Up next turn

dataList.name: Nervous
dataList.desc: Turn End: At -15 SP or lower, gain 3 Defense Level Up next turn
dataList.summary: Turn End: At -15 SP or lower, gain 3 Defense Level Up next turn

dataList.name: Faster!
dataList.desc: Gain 2 Haste

dataList.name: Aim True!
dataList.desc: Gain 3 Poise

dataList.name: Get 'Em!
dataList.desc: Simultaneously attacks one unit.

dataList.name: Momentary Cool
dataList.desc: Core and body lose 50% Max HP

dataList.name: Fever
dataList.desc:
Deal +10% damage per Count
Reduced by 1 at turn end

dataList.name: Expanding Sorrow
dataList.desc: Changes behavior.

dataList.name: Maddened (Low Morale)
dataList.desc: When at low morale for the first time, targets units indiscriminately

dataList.name: Maddened (Panic)
dataList.desc: Targets indiscriminately; Clash Power +1, and gain 2 Damage Up

dataList.name: Suicidal (Low Morale)
dataList.desc: When at low morale for the first time, become unable to act

dataList.name: Suicidal (Panic)
dataList.desc: Cannot act for 3 turns. Unit dies at turn start; all its allies lose 10 SP

dataList.name: Wandering (Low Morale)
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Deal 2 SP damage to allies

dataList.name: Wandering (Panic)
dataList.desc: Turn End: Deal 5 SP damage to allies. Flees from battle after 3 turns have passed

dataList.name: Dejection (Low Morale)
dataList.desc: In a clash, if any Coin lands tails, Clash Power -1 for the clash

dataList.name: Dejection (Panic)
dataList.desc: In a clash, if any Coin lands tails, Clash Power -3 for the clash

dataList.name: Growing
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, add +1 Count, and gain Max HP proportional to the Count. (Max 3)
dataList.summary: At the end of the turn, add +1 Count, and gain Max HP proportional to the Count. (Max 3)

dataList.name: Blooming
dataList.desc:
Turn End: At 5+ Count, take Sloth damage by (Count)% of Max HP, and become Fully Bloomed
At less than 5 Count, lose (Count * 5) SP, then reduce Count by 1

dataList.name: Fully Bloomed
dataList.desc:
Cannot act
At the end of the turn, lose 20 SP; if SP reaches -45, fully heal SP, then gain 'Dazzled Mind' next turn.
If this effect isn't removed for 2 turns, remove it at the end of the turn.

dataList.name: Dazzled Mind
dataList.desc:
Targets allies for attacks
When staggered, remove this effect next turn.
If this effect isn't removed for 2 turns, lose 30 SP and remove it at the end of the turn.

dataList.name: Dueling
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Units without this status go into a 'Fully Bloomed' status
If Yi Sang has this effect, Dongbaek gains 1 Attack Power Up

dataList.name: Scattering Petals
dataList.desc: Turn End: At 6+ Count, become staggered

dataList.name: Thorns
dataList.desc: When hit, return 50% of the damage taken to the attacker
dataList.summary: Deal 50% of damage taken to attacker

dataList.name: Perilous Heart
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 2 Attack Power Up and 3 Bind
dataList.summary: Turn Start: Gain 2 Attack Power Up and 3 Bind

dataList.name: Faltering Heart
dataList.desc: In panic, become staggered.

dataList.name: Corroding Heart
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 2 Attack Power Down, 2 Fragile, and 5 Bind
dataList.summary: Turn Start: Gain 2 Attack Power Down, 2 Fragile, and 5 Bind

dataList.name: Wrath Power Up
dataList.desc: Wrath skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Spark Discharge
dataList.desc: When hit, the attacker gains +1 Charge Count; when hit with a Gloom attack, gain +1 Rupture Count, then reduce Count by 1

dataList.name: Radiant Vanity
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, Dongrang gains 1 Protection and 1 Attack Power Up.

dataList.name: Empty Mark
dataList.desc: Targeted by Dongrang. Gain 2 Bind every turn, and take +50% damage from Dongrang.

dataList.name: Earnest Accomplishment
dataList.desc: If this unit is defeated or its HP is brought to 1, the attacker gains buffs.

dataList.name: Empty Honor
dataList.desc: If Dongrang defeats this unit, he loses HP, gains 1 Emptiness, and is weakened next turn.

dataList.name: Momentary Glory
dataList.desc: At 3+ Count, Dongrang becomes more powerful.

dataList.name: Emptiness
dataList.desc: At 4+ Count, Dongrang becomes staggered.

dataList.name: Borne Fruition
dataList.desc: The unit that defeated this unit heals HP, and gains 1 Haste and 1 Attack Power Up next turn

dataList.name: Radiant Desire
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Dongrang gains 1 Damage Up and 1 Protection.

dataList.name: Seeds
dataList.desc: Turn End: At 5+ Count, gain Nutrient Drain for 2 turns; at less than 5 Count, reduce Count by 1

dataList.name: Nutrient Drain
dataList.desc: Turn End: Dongrang heals 10 HP

dataList.name: Overheal
dataList.desc: Count rises by the amount of HP Dongrang caused to heal; at 50+ Count, take Gluttony damage by the effect's Count, gain 5 Fragile, and remove the effect.

dataList.name: Sinking Deluge
dataList.desc:
Deal SP damage by (Sinking Count * Sinking Potency), then remove Sinking
If target's SP is -45 or lower, the excess SP damage is dealt as Gloom-affinity HP damage
(Units with no Sanity take all of it as Gloom HP damage)

dataList.name: Sloth Power Up
dataList.desc: Sloth skills gain final Power by the effect’s Count for one turn.

dataList.name: Tears
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Lose 5 SP
Tails Coins inflict 2 Sinking

dataList.name: Nutrient Drain
dataList.desc: Turn End: Dongrang heals 10 HP

dataList.name: Fully Bloomed
dataList.desc:
Cannot act
At the end of the turn, lose 20 SP; if SP reaches -45, fully heal SP, then gain 'Dazzled Mind' next turn.
If this effect isn't removed for 2 turns, remove it at the end of the turn.

dataList.name: HP Healing Boost
dataList.desc: Increases HP healing provided by Passive abilities, Skills, and Coin effects. (Max 5)

dataList.name: Base Power Up
dataList.desc: Raise the Base Power of Skills by the effect's Count.

dataList.name: Max HP Up
dataList.desc: Raise the Max HP by 10% per Count.

dataList.name: K Corp Ampule
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: At less than 4 Count, heal by (Count * 5)% of Max HP
At 4+ Count, the unit dies

dataList.name: Talisman
dataList.desc:
On hit, inflict Rupture by the Count; When hit, gain Rupture by the Count.
Turn End: At 6+ Count, remove all Talisman and take fixed damage by its Count.
dataList.summary: Inflict Rupture with attacks and gain Rupture when hit

dataList.name: Understanding
dataList.desc: At the start of the battle, gain 2 E.G.O resources for every Affinity.
dataList.summary: Gain +2 E.G.O resource for all Affinities

dataList.name: Determined
dataList.desc: All Ally Units gain +2 Skill Final Power for this battle

dataList.name: Longing
dataList.desc: All Ally Units gain +1 Skill Power for this battle
